TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理当前 Web 应用程序的路径上下文。

span.span: Manages the path context for the current Web application.
This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: A object.
The name of the Web site.

param.name: applicationPath
param.span: 当前 Web 应用程序的根级别的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the root level of the current Web application.

param.name: path
param.span: 当前配置对象表示的 Web.config 文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the Web.config file that the current configuration object represents.

param.name: locationSubPath
param.span: 当前所编辑的 元素的路径值。

span.span: The path value of the element that is currently being edited.

param.name: appConfigPath
param.span: 当前 Web 应用程序的配置路径。

span.span: The current Web application's configuration path.
